title: Basic Connection
description: Connect two computers on the same network. Both devices must be able to communicate with each other.
requirements: Both hosts must be on the same network
Host B IP must be in the same subnet as Host A
Hosts should be able to communicate directly
hints: The subnet mask defines the network portion of an IP address
For /24 networks (255.255.255.0), the first 3 octets must match
Host A has IP 104.95.23.12, so Host B must have IP 104.95.23.X where X is between 1-254 and not 12
